title: AMAZING 2 Bd Penthouse Timber Loft w/ Steam Shower
posting_body: ['Penthouse timber loft with 19 foot ceilings, 14 foot windows, exposed brick and timber beams.', 'Get the character of a downtown building with greater space and convenience.', 'Both bathrooms are recently remodeled and the master bathroom has an amazing steam shower with body jets, rain shower, and hand spray.', 'Enjoy stunning sunsets from the 14 foot windows or sleep peacefully with a quiet street and custom motorized dark-out curtains.', 'A new spiral staircase leads you to a 200 sq ft bonus area that can be used for office, lounging, and much more.', 'In-unit laundry with large front-load washer and dryer.', 'Walk-in closet in the master bedroom with ample additional closet and storage space.', 'Stainless steel appliances, gas range, and open floor plan make cooking entertaining easy.', 'Steps from great restaurants and blocks from the Blue Line and the 606.', 'Gigabit WiFi internet and water is included.', 'Heated/cooled underground parking spot included with an extra-large 1.5x spot and plenty of storage.', 'Secured bike room.', 'Open the building door from your phone with built-in video call button.', "The building shares a rooftop patio with panoramic views of the skyline and a new workshop area for any projects you'd like to complete.", 'Pet friendly building.']
